section.p: The Diagnostic Results Section contains information about the results from diagnostic procedures the patient received.

ol.li: SHALL conform to IHE Coded Results Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.28) (C83-[CT-122-1])

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (C83-[CT-122-2]), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.17)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (C83-[CT-122-2]), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Result (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.15)
SHALL conform to IHE Coded Results Section template (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.28)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="30954-2" STUDIES SUMMARY (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] procedureEntry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure Entry

SHOULD contain at least one [1..*] entry, such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] External Reference (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (C83-[CT-122-2]), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Procedure (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.17)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] entry (C83-[CT-122-2]), such that
Contains exactly one [1..1] Result (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.15)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <section xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <templateId root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.3.28"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.122"/> <id root="6299314b-cab9-402e-a07e-e7360f8da8de"/> <code code="30954-2" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="STUDIES SUMMARY"/> <title>STUDIES SUMMARY</title> <entry> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.4"/> <id root="df597600-2854-4553-bde8-0e1aa49bdc1c"/> <text/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2011"/> <high value="2011"/> </effectiveTime> </act> </entry> <entry> <observation> <templateId root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13"/> <templateId root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5"/> <id root="8f3b7347-f93b-4742-a64f-b047f5f7c830"/> <code/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2011"/> <high value="2011"/> </effectiveTime> <repeatNumber/> <interpretationCode/> <methodCode/> <targetSiteCode/> </observation> </entry> <entry> <procedure> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.29"/> <templateId root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.19"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.17"/> <id root="ebd902ae-50df-401d-80b9-7bafdd1658e5"/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2011"/> <high value="2011"/> </effectiveTime> <targetSiteCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> </procedure> </entry> <entry> <observation moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.31"/> <templateId root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.3.88.11.83.15"/> <id root="00c0a2e9-e643-4650-a07d-6a85004ff551"/> <code/> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2011"/> <high value="2011"/> </effectiveTime> <interpretationCode/> <methodCode/> </observation> </entry> </section>
